name: Fruits Town
description:
Explore magical places and discover over hundreds of sweet levels filled with delicious treats!  Uniquely powerful boosters that will help you succeed and smash all the juicy fruits to win levels!
Match, pop and collect fruits, extremely addicting!

HOW TO PLAY
∷ Swipe and match 3 or more fruits to blast
∷ Match 4 or more fruits to create boosters and power-ups
∷ Collect leaves and water drops
∷ Collect target number of fruits to level up

FEATURES:
∷ Almost 150 deliciously fruity levels
∷ Super small APK size
∷ Journey through 5 new maps
∷ Challenging obstacles: Wood, Cookie, Ice and Block
∷ Fresh and adorable fruits
∷ Easy to play, hard to master
∷ Playing addictive fruity match 3 game for FREE

Adventure through this fantastic puzzle game while collecting as many fruits as you can!
